messages.messageBody:
http://www.gatotsuz.com/gz.php?id=principal
or just http://www.gatotsuz.com

scroll down to see 2 Saitou/Shinsengumi fanart
1 has been posted here probably a year ago, the other one is a new
rendition of Nobuhiro's work---but notice the artist's take on a young
SAitou---truly outstanding/professional work!!!
